channel.title: MYB
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from MYB, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: “I didn’t see you there”

item.title: It's Time To Take The Security Of Employee Data More Seriously
item.description: To cybercriminals, employee data is just as lucrative and exploitable as customer information.

item.title: The Long And Short Of Carbon Capture Tech
item.description: The second article in our series investigates why it is so hard to implement carbon capture in power generation and industry.

item.title: Why Your Data Is Holding You Back
item.description: The onslaught of data isn't going to slow down, so the ability to effectively leverage that data will continue to increase in importance.

item.title: Destiny 2’s Festival Of The Lost Is Handing Out A Gun That Isn’t Supposed To Exist
item.description: Destiny 2 has introduced a brand new weapon archetype in Festival of the Lost, a Heavy Burst shotgun that fires two rounds at a time.
